full_name_en: General Certificate of Secondary Education — Chemistry
description_ru: Экзамен по химии в Великобритании для учеников 10–11 классов. Охватывает как неорганическую, так и органическую химию.
description_en: UK chemistry exam for Year 10-11 students. Covers both inorganic and organic chemistry, quantitative chemistry, and analytical techniques.
topics: Atomic structure and the periodic table
Bonding, structure, and properties of matter
Rate and extent of chemical change
